scriptComments.swagger:gen: // uses swagger-codegen to generate Angular services and models from the API swagger specification
scriptComments.swagger:gen-win: // use instead of swagger-gen when running from a Windows machine
scriptComments.docker:identity: // Runs a production version of identity server configured for caster-ui and caster-api useful when debugging the caster-api locally
scriptComments.docker:stack:proxy: // Runs the entire caster stack with proxy settings
scriptComments.docker:build:ui:dev: // Builds a development docker image for caster UI for debugging
scriptComments.docker:build:ui:prod: // Builds a production docker image for caster UI (small)
scriptComments.docker:destroy: // Destroys the docker stack, data retained

scripts.swagger:gen: curl --insecure http://localhost:4309/swagger/v1/swagger.json --output swagger.json && node_modules/@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli/bin/openapi-generator generate -i ./swagger.json -g typescript-angular -o src/app/generated/caster-api --additional-properties ngVersion=11.2 --additional-properties useRxJS6=true --additional-properties modelPropertyNaming=original --skip-validate-spec
scripts.swagger:gen-win: docker run --rm -v %CD%:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v5.1.0 generate -i http://host.docker.internal:4309/swagger/v1/swagger.json?format=openapi -g typescript-angular -o /local/src/app/generated/caster-api --additional-properties ngVersion=11.2 --additional-properties useRxJS6=true --additional-properties modelPropertyNaming=original --skip-validate-spec
